project_slogan: Application to add new projects by author
project_technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, EJS, JavaScript, React, html, css
project_description: Web project to create Project cards with the author's information, consisting of two applications; a frontend built with JavaScript, React HTML5, and SCSS, and an API built with Nodejs and Express, connected to a MySQL DB to store the information.

project_slogan: Application to search harry potter characters
project_technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, EJS, JavaScript, React, html, css
project_description: Web project to search and list Harry potter information.
